CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Project_Phase__c, 'Draft - Phase Zero'), IF( Percent_Complete_Hours__c < 0.05, IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOT&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Green'), IF( Percent_Complete_Hours__c < 0.15, IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOd&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Yellow'), IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOY&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Red') ) ),
IF( ISPICKVAL(Project_Phase__c, 'Design'), IF( Percent_Complete_Hours__c < 0.25, IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOT&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Green'), IF( Percent_Complete_Hours__c < 0.35, IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOd&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Yellow'), IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOY&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Red') ) ), IF( ISPICKVAL(Project_Phase__c, 'Proof of Concept'), IF( Percent_Complete_Hours__c < 0.5, IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOT&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Green'), IF( Percent_Complete_Hours__c < 0.60, IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOd&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Yellow'), IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOY&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Red') ) ), IF( ISPICKVAL(Project_Phase__c, 'Build'), IF( Percent_Complete_Hours__c < 0.75, IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOT&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Green'), IF( Percent_Complete_Hours__c < 0.85, IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOd&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Yellow'), IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOY&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Red') ) ), IF( ISPICKVAL(Project_Phase__c, 'Implementation'), IF( Percent_Complete_Hours__c < 1, IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOT&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Green'), IF( Percent_Complete_Hours__c < 1.1, IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOd&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Yellow'), IMAGE('https://na6.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01580000000eXOY&oid=00D80000000ZNOz', 'Red') ) ), '')))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is an example of a conditional, custom formula field that evaluates the Project Phase and the Percent Complete (hours). Default Value for "Draft - Phase Zero" (Green 0 - .05%, Yellow .06 - .15, Red .16 and above). For more definition, go into setup
CustomField.label: Status Icon
